m_szDocTitle: MANAGING ENERGY ASSETS ASSOCIATED WITH TRANSPORT OPERATIONS - Viridity Energy, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- MANAGING ENERGY ASSETS ASSOCIATED WITH TRANSPORT OPERATIONS United States Patent Application 20130204443 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: Apparatus, systems, and methods are described that can be used to generate an operating schedule for a controller of an energy storage asset that is in communication with a transport vehicle, based on an optimization process. The operating schedule is generated based on an operation characteristic of the energy storage asset, an energy-generating capacity of the transport vehicle in communication with the energy storag
